title: Parking receipts and validation tickets
dataVerified: Location, entry/exit time, parking fee, payment method, validation
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake parking receipts (expense fraud). Domain binding verifies parking operator. Expense claim verification. Prevents inflated parking fee claims. Validation stamp verification.
